content.rendered:
The airline was established in 2001 and performed its first flight domestically on May 25, 2003. Today, it has over 140 employees  and operates flights to two destinations internationally, and ten destinations domestically by its three Fokker 50 aircraft, with 50 seats. It received its first Fokker 50 in May 2003 and received its Fokker 100 in January 2006. By merging with ‘Monnis Group’ in June 2007, Aero Mongolia took numerous actions to strengthen its management, to stabilize financial capability and to ensure flight safety.

 

 

 Queries handled Aero Mongolia Airlines Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries. Skymiles

List of Aero Mongolia Airlines Offices :

Mongolia – Ulaanbaatar
Mongolia – Hohhot
Russia – Irkutsk
Mongolia – Bayan-ulgii
Mongolia – Khovd
Mongolia – Uvs
Mongolia – Govi-altai
Mongolia – Zavkhan
Mongolia – Khuvsgul
Mongolia – Umnugovi
Korea – Seoul

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Aero Mongolia Airlines Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Aero Mongolia Airlines : (click on the stars below)
